entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of wet flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of wet flurries or rain showers near noon. Wind south 20 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 18 January 2023
